cards.summary: Use ambulatory blood pressure monitoring to address blood pressure variability
cards.detail: You had a high blood pressure reading recently.  Your blood pressure has varied from reading to reading significantly.  Sometimes there is a health risk with highly variable blood pressure.  A 24 hour ambulatory/walking measurement will us provide the best care.;https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYPERTENSIONAHA.120.15024;;at-most-one;https://www.heart.org/en/health-topics/high-blood-pressure/understanding-blood-pressure-readings/monitoring-your-blood-pressure-at-home
